channel.title: processing data on Lightelligence®
channel.description: Recent content in processing data on Lightelligence®

item.title: Querying Times Series Data
item.description: Apply multiple filters to your time series data. With a single API call, get data from multiple devices. Use cases: Obtain data from devices connected to a specific gateway from devices of a certain category @tbd: link to chapter device type - Assigning categories from devices with specific tags @tbd: link to chapter Devices - Assigning tags @tbd: Jewgeni

item.title: Streaming Data
item.description: @Team Turing What is the outbound streaming meant to be used for? How can it be used in a browser? How can it be used in a backend? What are the limitations? What does the user need to know when using the websocket connection (i.e. retries) Setting Up Websocket Streaming @tbd Including Filters in Websocket Streaming Use cases: Filter by device type Filter by tag @tbd: @Jewgeni?

item.title: Visualizing Data
item.description: Create template dashboard Copy template to “stream” in Qlik (Qlik stream = OLT tenant) Apply new versions of template later on
